pages.text: As an alloy, $(l:intro/orichalcum)Orichalcum$() may be fashioned into gears, and due to its high alchemical charge, $(item)Orichalcum Gears$() are essential resources in the practice of the $(thing)Engineering$() branch.$(br2)Aside from their reactivity to $(thing)Redstone$() and high flexibility, there isn't much else special about these gears. You'll be making them a lot, though.
A fairly simple recipe, it may be wise to memorize it, as it'll be a recurring theme in your studies.
